name: Kathy Newsom
text: This was my first time going there. My pizza was delish!

name: Jackie Robinson
text: Love being able to make my pizza with as many toppings as I want

name: Nixx 901
text: One of the best thin crust pizzas in town AND if you take the price into consideration I would say the best thin crust pizza in town. $8.99 for unlimited toppings I'm game!

name: Blake Mitchusson
text: I hate to give low reviews, but this location needs a lot of work to be on par with it's counterpart in North Germantown Pkwy. Lack-luster service, dirty tables, lipstick stains on the glasses at the beer wall, and 6 of the 16 beers are out ‚Ä¶More

name: Jimmy Arnold
text:
Good experience!  Ingredients look/taste fresh.  Good variety of toppings.
I had thin crust.  It was firm but not dry and definitely not doughy.  Good.
Regular tomato sauce was good. Slightly sweet but not sugary. ‚Ä¶More

name: Erika Cox Lindsay Slemp
text: We are very happy with our experience at PizzaRev in Cordova.  We were given coupons for free pizza if we showed up during their soft opening on Feb 14.  Two of my coworkers and I planned on going, but somehow we mixed up the time and we ‚Ä¶More

name: Caroline Lutey
text: They were light on the toppings. Like very light. And I'm not sure if I actually got the low fat mozzarella because nobody seem to know for sure what they had. They knew they were out of one of them and the shift leader was "pretty sure" that they had low fat but not regular. It wasn't convincing

name: Krystal O'Neal
text: I'm so sorry to report that his pizza wasn't good at all. I specifically ordered a specialty, figuring it would be better than what I could create. It was cheese, 5 slices of fennel sausage and no sauce. The pizza crust was under cooked, ‚Ä¶More

name: Wayne Taylor
text: Had an awful time there they advertised half price beer from 3p to 6p. When I paid my check the manager of the location said they are not setup to honor that at this location. She was no help said there was nothing she could do or would do. ‚Ä¶More

name: Kai Washington
text: Love this place. Lots of great toppings at one low price and quick service. Also like the beer taps. You can pour as much or as little as you want and create your own flights.

name: Mac Ed
text: I brought my wife here for her first time and boy do I regret it. We ordered our pizzas and everything was great until the checkout lady came to my table and said my pizza stuck to the oven because of a lack of flour and they would have to ‚Ä¶More

name: Will Landrum
text: Great pizza. Sauce was good and alot of great toppings. Clean and staff were very helpful. Beer gets changed monthly. We definitely are going back!!

name: Haley Baird
text: Great pizza! The staff is really very friendly and the place is very clean. I can't wait to bring my fiancee here to try the beer wall

name: Araceli Garcia
text: I love pizza and this place is amazing. I love the beer wall concept and the beer selection at this location. Get the app for pizza points! Also the staff here are amazing, always friendly and helpful.

name: Josh B
text: Pizza was good. Service was good. Didn't try any draft, but the selection was great.

name: Timothy Fowler
text: Pizza was delicious. Very clean. After we paid employee told us she realized it was free kids meal night and she reimbursed us of her own will.

name: Rodrigo De Leon
text: Had a great experience today. Everyone working there had a great attitude, quite uplifting and friendly. I asked for a little bit of onion on my pizza and they sprinkled just a bit. Really dig the beer wall since it lets me start off with a ‚Ä¶More

name: Renee Smith
text: Went to this location for the first time today for lunch.  It was very disappointing.  It was eerily quiet for a place that has just been opened for less than 2 weeks and now I know why.  The staff, with the exception of one girl, were all ‚Ä¶More

name: Tony Longinotti
text: I love the experience and the food is great. Local brews on tap is a plus to the community. Keep up the good work. Please add wine soon.

name: Justin Lee
text:
üçï made I wanted and cooked fast.
Also the staff was nice

name: Kimberly Schreiber
text: Place was completely empty, including employees. Waited 5 minutes and walked out. The lone customer eating there said everyone was ‚Äúon a break.‚Äù  They were sold out of 5 beers. If you want to  see the empty restaurant, check out my photo.

name: Dan VanderLaan
text: Great pizza.  Self service beer wall.

name: Vicky Schatz
text: Took the family and we loved it. Fast, fresh, and tasty and no fighting over the toppings since you each get your own pizza.

name: Weston Steger
text: The pizza is good not great but good. Dont get the beer. We went for happy hour and got two beers at half off and paid 10 dollars for them soooo it would be normally 20 for two blue moons? I asked the cashier and she insisted that was right so 10 dollar a beer what a scam.

name: Bridget Strait
text: Clean and orderly. Fresh and you pick your own toppings

name: michael epperson
text: Create your own pizza. Good beer selection. Relaxed atmosphere.

name: Aaron Jackson
text: Great food but they burnt my pizza

name: Rock Bottom
text: Food is good, but the service isn't really ironed out yet. No shortage of poorly trained preoccupied people running the place.

name: SonjaAskew
text: My fav pizza place. The beer is too expensive. Seating and giants TV's are great.

name: Belinda Brown
text: Always clean and fast. Just surprised as new as it is they have broken wobbly tables

name: L Nicole Campbell
text: Exceptional customer service! Friendly management and staff.  Jalen is the best.

name: Lindsey White
text: Lots of options with no extra charge for unlimited toppings!

name: Zak Lad
text: Great place, yummy pizza, and a friendly crew! Will definitely be back many more times!

name: Will Thomas
text: Red sauce tastes like butts, but everything else is really good.

name: Travis Keenum
text: One of the best pizzas I have had in a long time.

name: Justin Campbell
text: Great service, the pizza was great. Cool beer craft station

name: David Adams
text:
Tried to eat here.  Note, I said *Tried*

Walked in an hour before closing, found no employees.  Waited, walked along the ‚Ä¶More

name: Mark Pillow
text: Good place, don't drink but the beer wall is cool. Pizza is good.

name: Dr. Dale and Lee Ann Foster
text: We love this place - great gluten free pizza, fresh ingredients, great, friendly service!!

name: Madeline Webb
text: Just open and will be back very soon. For 1st day,they were on top of things!! Had great promotional deal. Employees were nice,very helpful. Manager Brandin came to tsbles,see if people needed help with drinks. Brittany checking out and ‚Ä¶More

name: Jonah Schiavone
text: Best pizza to exist. Don't go to pyros ;)

name: Clay Markley
text: Pizza wasn't that great. Cool spot to hang out though

name: William Thompson
text: Staff friendly and service was good enjoyed the pizza

name: Steve Robertson
text: Very good service and the pizza was great!

name: Lamonte Bethea
text: Excellent pizza and a great selection of beers.

name: Mitzi Ithmaidi
text: very good!! Very friendly staff.

text: Nobody can touch pizzarev!!!!!! Trust me!!!
